statements: SELECT * FROM BillingInvoicingData WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_date FROM BillingInvoicingData WHERE invoice_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT invoice_id, amount FROM BillingInvoicingData WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM BillingInvoicingData ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM BillingInvoicingData WHERE customer_id = 54321;
SELECT * FROM BillingInvoicingData WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT invoice_id, amount FROM BillingInvoicingData WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(invoice_id) AS num_invoices FROM BillingInvoicingData GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM BillingInvoicingData WHERE invoice_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM BillingInvoicingData WHERE customer_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM billing_data;
SELECT invoice_id, customer_id, total_amount, invoice_date FROM billing_data ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT invoice_id, total_amount FROM billing_data WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM billing_data GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT f.analysis_id, f.revenue, f.expense, b.customer_id FROM financial_analysis f JOIN billing_data b ON f.invoice_id = b.invoice_id;
SELECT * FROM billing_data ORDER BY invoice_date DESC, total_amount ASC
SELECT invoice_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM billing_data WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT b.invoice_id, f.revenue, f.expense FROM billing_data b JOIN financial_analysis f ON b.invoice_id = f.invoice_id WHERE f.revenue > f.expense ORDER BY b.invoice_date DESC
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_date, total_amount FROM billing_data WHERE invoice_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT b.invoice_id, f.revenue, f.expense FROM billing_data b LEFT JOIN financial_analysis f ON b.invoice_id = f.invoice_id WHERE f.analysis_id IS NULL
SELECT * FROM billing_data;
SELECT invoice_number, customer_name, amount FROM billing_data ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, amount FROM billing_data WHERE amount > 500;
SELECT invoice_number, payment_date, amount_paid FROM payment_data WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT month_year, total_revenue, total_expenses, net_profit FROM financial_analysis;
SELECT * FROM billing_data ORDER BY invoice_date DESC, amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, invoice_number, amount FROM billing_data WHERE customer_name='John Doe' AND invoice_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT invoice_number, invoice_date, amount_paid FROM payment_data WHERE payment_method='Credit Card' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT month_year, total_revenue, total_expenses, net_profit FROM financial_analysis WHERE month_year BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT bd.customer_name, pd.payment_method, bd.amount, pd.amount_paid FROM billing_data bd JOIN payment_data pd ON bd.invoice_number=pd.invoice_number WHERE bd.amount=pd.amount_paid;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT invoice_id, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE payment_status = true;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE 'New%';
SELECT invoice_date, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE payment_status = FALSE ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 10 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, invoice_date, total_amount, amount_paid FROM customers c JOIN invoices i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id JOIN payments p ON i.invoice_id = p.invoice_id WHERE c.customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM billing_data;
SELECT customer_id, invoice_number, billing_date, billing_amount FROM billing_data ORDER BY billing_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customer_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM product_data WHERE unit_price > 100;
SELECT invoice_number, invoice_date, customer_id FROM invoice_data WHERE invoice_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM billing_data ORDER BY billing_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM product_data WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT invoice_number, payment_amount FROM invoice_data INNER JOIN payment_data ON invoice_data.id = payment_data.invoice_id WHERE payment_amount >= 500;
SELECT customer_name, invoice_date FROM customer_data INNER JOIN invoice_data ON customer_data.id = invoice_data.customer_id ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
